Entries.Introduction: Oh, hey there. My name's Jas. What's yours?$u
Entries.reject_869: Ehh... no thanks, farmer @. Vincent would probably like that, though.$s
Entries.Tue: *giggle* Sorry, I just remembered a really funny joke Haley told me. It was about yo... I mean, a farmer!
Entries.Tue6: Sometimes I still play with dolls. Usually it's just to tease Vincent whenever he comes over, though.$h
Entries.Wed: ...$u#$e#Hey, do you ever get shy? I do, a lot... I've been trying to work on it.$u
Entries.Wed2: Hey there. What've you been doing, farmer?$u
Entries.Wed4: Aunt Marnie *still* has me on a 10 o'clock curfew. That's ridiculous, right?!$s#$e#I'm {{JasAge}}, I'm not a baby anymore!
Entries.Thu: Aunt Marnie says not to talk to strangers... but you're definitely not a stranger, are you?$h
Entries.Thu2: I'm glad I learned cursive when I was little. It's really easy to make something look fancy!
Entries.Fri: ...Hey, I've seen you around. How, umm... how are you?$u
Entries.Fri2: I think I'm gonna wear my bow for the rest of my life. I'll be the prettiest gal in the nursing home!$h
Entries.Fri4: Living on a farm is great. Sometimes, Aunt Marnie will make ice cream from the fresh cow's milk.#$b#Wanna come over and try it sometime?$h
Entries.Sat: You smell like grass. Heh, just like Vincent...$l#$b#Umm... what was I saying again? Sorry, I kinda zoned out...$u
Entries.Sat2: When I was a kid, I'd look for crawdads in the river. Don't tell Aunt Marnie... but I fed one to a cow once.#$e#She loved it. Who would've guessed?
Entries.Sat8: Hey, @. Thanks for being such a cool uncle!^Hey, @. Thanks for being such a cool aunt!$h#$e#Most of the older people in this town are real buzzkills, but you're different.
Entries.Sun: Huh? Do you... need something?$u#$e#Anything I can do to help?$u
Entries.Sun2: Shane's gone a lot, and Aunt Marnie is busy all the time... but I almost always have Vincent.#$e#He's been with my for basically my whole life... isn't that sweet?$h
Entries.Sun10: Did you know Shane's my godfather? He was a friend of my parents.$s#$e#...I'm... glad I know him.$h
Entries.rejectNPCA: Oh...$3#$b#I... aren't you a bit old for me?$2
Entries.rejectNPCB: I really just don't think that would work.$4
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: ...No? We don't know each other at all.$a
Entries.engageB: You're engaged. Besides, you knew me when I was a kid!$4
Entries.marriedA: Ooooookay, I'm going to just back up and slowly walk away. Goodbye.$3
Entries.marriedB: You're married. What about that isn't sinking in?$a

Entries.winter_18.000: I have to visit the doctor today... it's inconvenient, but at least this town *has* a hospital.
Entries.winter_15.369: ...Finally, I get to see what this is all about. I'm so excited!$h
Entries.winter_15.001: OOOOOOOH! *That's* why I was never allowed to see the mermaid show!$l#$b#Hehe... Vincent's gonna be red as a tomato when he goes in.$u#$b#Please, don't tell him, I wanna see his reaction.$h
Entries.winter_18.001: I try my best to be healthy... is that working out well?
Entries.summer.000: Dunno what it is, but the ocean is just a really nice place.#$b#I can understand why Elliott and Willy chose to live here!$h
Entries.winter_15.000: Pretty cold out, huh? I don't mind it all that much, though.#$b#I've got a sweater and a warm thermos of hot cocoa... what more could I ask for?$h#$b#Well... there is *one* thing I can think of...$u
Entries.spring.000: Me and Vincent are planning on going swimming in the lake out here.#$b#Don't tell anyone, okay?$h

Changes.LogName: Jas 18 dialogue - schedule strings - Vincent dead

Entries.winter_15.001: Have you seen the mermaid show yet?#$b#It's *really* something, I'll tell you that much...$h
Entries.winter_15.000: Brr... it's pretty cold... would be nice to have someone to hold onto, huh?
Entries.spring.000: I'm planning on going swimming in the lake out here. Sounds fun, right?#$b#Just don't tell anyone. I'm probably not allowed to.$h

Entries.winter_15: 900 AnimalShop 7 5 0/1100 Forest 38 10 2 jas_jumprope "Strings\schedules\Jas:winter_15.000"/1300 Beach 19 18 2/1730 MermaidHouse 6 8 0 "Strings\schedules\Jas:winter_15.369"/2000 Beach 19 24 2 "Strings\schedules\Jas:winter_15.001"/2300 AnimalShop 1 7 3 jas_sleep

Entries.Jas: Vincent never changes; he's *still* teasing me about how he's going to get more eggs than me. I guess I kind of don't mind, though.$h
Entries.Jas_y2: This year, I'll show Abby that the younger generation can keep up!$h

Entries.Jas: Teehee... Vincent said I look good in this dress. I think he has a little crush.$l#$e#It's nice being a flower queen.$h
C'mon, Vincy! It's a beautiful day out, loosen up a little!$h#$b#You've got a dance partner right here.$u

Changes.LogName: Jas 18 dialogue - Dance of the Moonlight Jellies

Entries.Jas: Ah... the jellies are so pretty. The light is really nice and moody, too.#$b#Kinda romantic...$u
Jeez, these little guys have a taste for human fingers...$u#$b#Hey, Vincy, wanna come pet this one?$h
C'mon, Vincy! It's not *that* scary!#$b#Here, take my hand, you big dork.$u

Building snowmen is a lot more fun when you've got someone helping you out. You each get to put in your own little touches.$h#$b#Like Vincent, for example. He stole a pair of Pierre's sunglasses and stuck them on.$u

Changes.LogName: Jas 18 dialogue - Feast of the Winter Star

Entries.Jas: I used to only come here for the presents, but now, I really like the food, too.#$b#What was I thinking, not liking stuffing?$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh... Vincent is here? Maybe this'll finally get it through his big head.$h

DuringMovie.Text: He looks like he's enjoying himself...

AfterMovie.Text: Well, I think all three of us had fun. Thanks for taking me!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh, hey, Vincent is here! Teehee... he's probably gonna cry!$h

DuringMovie.Text: Hmm... he's actually keeping it together! Color me surprised.$h

AfterMovie.Text: Heh, I would've expected Vincy to be more of a baby, but I guess not!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Oh, hey, Vincent is here! Well, I'm sure this'll be fun no matter what, then!$h
Teehee... I always loved going to the movies.$h

AfterMovie.Text: That was really great! Thanks for bringing me!$h

BeforeMovie.Text: Ooh, spooky! Heh... maybe this time, *you'll* be the one crying!$h

DuringMovie.Script: /message "Jas is breathing steadily, smirking to herself."
DuringMovie.Text: So, how are you holding up, @?

AfterMovie.Text: ...And we both got out of it totally okay. I guess now we know; neither one of us are kids.

BeforeMovie.Text: Ooh, I've heard of this one, but I've never watched it before.

AfterMovie.Text: That was really nice! Old movies are really pretty, don't you think?$h
